person.name: F. Michael Watson
person.description: Elder F. Michael Watson was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 5, 2008, at age 65. At the time of his call, he was Secretary to the First Presidency. He has served in the Area Presidency of the Africa Southeast Area and is currently serving in the Pacific Area Presidency.
